content: knit these fabulous funky toy chicks a free pattern download originally from the organic cotton kids collection 1 designed by janice anderson /designers/janice-anderson re-worked in bright shades of baby merino silk dk and re-named this design is knitted mostly in stocking stitch a perfect easter knit gift for little ones this knitting pattern is for the intermediate knitter *this is a free pattern available to members of the knitrowan website * **yarn information ** ***for esther*** a - sunshine 688 1 skein 147 yards b - zinc 681 1 skein 147 yards ***for ernie*** a - teal 677 1 skein 147 yards b - zinc 681 1 skein 147 yards ***for enid*** a - strawberry 687 1 skein 147 yards b - zinc 681 1 skein 147 yards *additional yarn needed * small amounts of 3 other dk colours **extras ** - washable toy stuffing 2 black beads for eyes j3001017 - popcorn kernels or plastic beans - 10cm florist wire 1 http //theauldwoollyalliance wordpress com/designs/designs-by-janice-anderson/#jp-carousel-159
